entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT ENDED, Placentia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:10 AM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Flurries and a few local snow squalls ending before morning then cloudy. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 8:36 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning then changing to rain in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 near noon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 8:36 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the evening then cloudy with flurries beginning near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 70 near midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 8:36 PM NST Thursday 02 February 2023
